item.title: FDA Approves First Treatment for MAS in Still Disease
item.description: Emapalumab is approved for both adults and pediatric (newborn and older) patients with MAS in Still disease with an inadequate response or intolerance...

item.title: FDA Drops REMS Programs for Some CAR-Ts
item.description: Using CAR T-cell therapies for blood cancer should be less burdensome following labeling updates. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Novel Drug Lowers Stubbornly High BP in Phase 3 Trial
item.description: Lorundrostat, an aldosterone synthase inhibitor, effectively treated uncontrolled hypertension in Launch-HTN, researchers reported in JAMA. Medscape M...

item.title: New AI System to Flag NHS Safety Risks Early
item.description: The UK will deploy AI technology to scan NHS data in real time, aiming to detect safety issues faster and prevent patient harm. Medscape News UK

item.title: Revascularizing Vessels After STEMI Sees Durable Gains
